creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: peak of Mt. Fuji glowing pink; grey sky and blue-grey landscape with silhouetted trees
inscription: Left: [御殿場の富士] {?????}; bottom, in black: [Mt. Fuji from Gotenba], in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida], in black: [1987]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Mt. Fuji from Gotenba
